name: It is Just A Story - horror game
name_original: It is Just A Story - horror game
description:
Come experience the reality in this story, everything happening was just a story.

Playing as a doctor who lost his family and memory during the apocalypse and must survive to find a solution to the virus.


You had a memory reset to when you were single due to a mental shock from seeing your wife lifeless on the floor, Even your crying daughter you met along the way was left behind by you and she died from infection, the only thing you know is the instructions to find a solution in a city which is the location of your office,.. of course not without fighting zombies and logically thinking.

Game key features

  • A lot of jump scares
    you don't deal with only zombies, we put in some surprising packages that guarantee you will be shocked at least twice.

  • HD graphics

  • Logical thinking needs to be applied to complete most levels
  • An engaging and dark atmosphere gives the abandoned vibe.
  • Open-ended World
  • Emotional story
  • Lots of creatures and zombies.

You have 3 Locations to explore

A straight road that should have taken 3 days but you were forced to pass by 4 other locations before you got to the city due to a car accident.

The Locations:

(main)The house,

(main)The school,
The forest,
The underground sewer,
The abandoned factory,
The city,

(main)The office.

* If you love horror games and challenging events, and want something to try out then this is the game for you, if not then this game will be boring for you.
